Flow.description: Screen flow for Statement of Need with Flow Interview breaks
Flow.label: MMPD - Statement of Need

recordCreates.description: Sends a task to Divisional VP/ Manager

recordCreates.label: Divisonal VP Approval

value.stringValue: Please review the related case for approval. Upon approving a it will create a subsequent task for SISC

screens.description: Statement of Need form for New Program Proposal and Change in Program Proposal Case Record Types
screens.name: Copy_1_of_Statement_of_Need
screens.label: readOnly Statement of Need

value.stringValue: Please enter in the format of YYYY (eg: 2024)
Begin by clearly stating what the program is designed to do and its reasons for existence. Include how the program aims to encourage economic development.
Describe the economic need the program intends to fill, providing context for the program's existence.
Identify the data or research supporting the program's rationale.
Articulate the program's purpose and explain how it intends to meet the identified economic needs.
Outline the impact the program aims to achieve, including which pillars of Economic well-being it supports.
Based on the programâ€™s purpose, define the businesses or entities expected to benefit from the program's incentives.
List the program's essential features (excluding budget) that are necessary to achieve its desired impact. Explain why each feature is important.
Reason_for_Program_Success__c:List the program's essential features (excluding budget) that are necessary to achieve its desired impact. Explain why each feature is important.
Project_Goal_Reason__c:Why is it important to the Porgram?
Specify the types of project goals that should align with the program's desired impact, explaining why these goals are important and how data on these goals will be collected.

fields.name: WarningDivisionVP
fields.fieldText: NOTE! Adding a Divisional VP is required to further process this submission. This will forward your submission through the Review Processes of the Division VP, Steering Committee and Working Group.

fields.name: Do_you_want_to_submit_your_work_for_Division_VP_s_Review
fields.fieldText: Do you want to submit your work for Division VP's Review?

value.stringValue: Please select the appropriate Divisional VP for moving ahead with the review process of the Program
